text:
Thousands of customers already rely on
Amazon Athena to perform highly scalable analytics
in the data lakes and data meshes.

To perform more complex data analysis,
organizations are adopting Apache Spark

which enables them to run fast analytics
workloads against data of any size
that offers a rich ecosystem of open source libraries.
Introducing Amazon Athena for Apache Spark

With Amazon Athena,
you can easily run interactive analytics

using Apache Spark and instantly
analyze petabytes of data.

With Amazon Athena, interactive Spark applications
start instantly in under a second
and run faster with our optimized spark runtime.

So you spend more time on insights
not waiting for results.

Use simplified notebooks on the Amazon
Athena console

and the expressive programing power
of Python to build Spark applications.

Athena’s deep integration with other 
AWS services such as Amazon S3 and AWS Glue

enables you to query data from various sources, 
chain multiple calculations together,
and visualize the results of your analyses.
With Athena’s serverless, fully managed model,

there are no resources to manage, provision 
and configure and no minimum fee or setup cost.
You only pay for the queries you run.

Get started with interactive analytics
on Apache Spark in under a second.
